{3}{G}: Level 3
Creatures you control have +X/+X, where X is the number of counters on them.

[i](Gain the next level as a sorcery to add its ability.)[/i]
{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you don't control. Create a tapped Treasure token.
{1}{R}{R}: Level 2
When this class becomes level 2, exchange control of two target permanents that share a type.
{4}{R}{R}: Level 3
When this class becomes level 3, exile the top five cards of each opponent's library. You may cast cards exiled this way.

cards.rules_text:
Affinity for energy counters [i](This spell costs {1} less to cast for each energy counter you control.)[/i]
When you cast this spell, you get {E} [i](an energy counter)[/i].
Sunburst [i](This enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)[/i]
Outlast {E} [i]({E}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Outlast {1}{B} [i]({1}{B}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Persist [i](When this creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]
cards.notes: cc6r5 — Original card credits "Yaroslav Mogutin", I found this card art on Springborg's blog as concept art.

cards.rules_text:
Reach
When this creature enters or dies, create a 1/2 green Spider token with reach for each creature card in your graveyard.

This creature's power and toughness are equal to the number of Swamps on the battlefield.
When this creature enters or deals combat damage to a player, put a bog counter on target nonbasic land.
Lands with counters on them are basic Swamps.

Cascade [i](When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
Discard your hand.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Add one mana of any color. Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Cursed to never feel its cool touch again as all gold they touch turns to goblins.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
{BR}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When this creature dies, target opponent exiles a card from their hand. Until the end of their next turn, they may play that card.

Flying, vigilance
When this creature attacks you may pay {2}{G} or {E}{E}{E}. If you do, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. You gain 1 life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Dovin's father, a struggling inventor, spared no time for Dovin. Dovin instead spent his time watching the beauty of nature.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When Geralf, the Stitcher enters, each player mills cards until they mill a creature. Exile each creature milled this way. Create a black Zombie creature token with power equal to the product of each exiled card's power, and toughness equal to the product of each exiled card's toughness.
Fish you control can't be blocked except by creatures with reach or haste.
